item.title: Determining the real client IP with Varnish (w/ X-Forwarded-For)
item.description: If you implement Varnish in your application one of the early things that you discover is that  any IP functionalities you had are now gone. Some examples are: GEOIP does not resolve the country Apache logs write 127.0.0.1 as request client IP (or another IP of your LAN) My own PHP logic cannot longer apply filters by IP Why? Well, it's easy to answer.
